----------------------------------------
Target Analysis: Static React SPA (Single Page Application) hosted on Firebase.
All paths return index.html. No server-side endpoints detected. Client-side only.
JS bundle: /static/js/main.018233b1.js (minified React). No API/fetch calls visible.
No Firebase Realtime DB or Cloud Functions exposed. No source code leaks (.git absent).
Source map exposed: /s

content:
----------------------------------------
VULNERABILITY REPORT: https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/
----------------------------------------
Target Analysis: Static React SPA (Single Page Application) hosted on Firebase.
All paths return index.html. No server-side endpoints detected. Client-side only.
JS bundle: /static/js/main.018233b1.js (minified React). No API/fetch calls visible.
No Firebase Realtime DB or Cloud Functions exposed. No source code leaks (.git absent).
Source map exposed: /static/js/main.018233b1.js.map [LOW] - Reveals code mappings.

[SQL INJECTION]
Status: NOT VULNERABLE
Tested: curl "https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/search?q=%27%20OR%20%271%27=%271"
Response: Standard index.html (no param reflection/processing)
No backend database interaction.

[XSS]
Status: NOT VULNERABLE (reflected)
Tested: curl "https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/?q=%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C/script%3E"
Response: Standard index.html (no echo)
DOM-based XSS untestable via curl (requires JS execution).

[COMMAND INJECTION]
Status: NOT VULNERABLE
Tested: curl "https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/api/users;cat%20/etc/passwd"
Response: Standard index.html
No shell access/params processed server-side.

[PATH TRAVERSAL / LFI]
Status: NOT VULNERABLE
Tested: curl "https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/%2e%2e/%2e%2e/%2e%2e/%2e%2e/etc/passwd"
Response: Empty/404 (no file disclosure)
.git/HEAD: index.html (no leak)

Hacker's Note:
No server-side vulns possible in static SPA. All requests SPA-routed client-side.
Firebase config/DB not public. Secure deployment for tested vectors.

SUMMARY: Clean scan. 0/4 vulnerabilities exploited. Target is secure static frontend.
Probed 20+ endpoints/payloads via curl. JS analyzed (no APIs). Testing complete.
----------------------------------------

ATTACK TARGET: https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/

PROCEED IMMEDIATELY WITH TESTING:
1. Probe the target URL for endpoints
2. Run actual exploit attempts using curl/http requests
3. Test for: SQL injection, XSS, command injection, path traversal
4. Document successful exploits with proof

GENERATE REPORT (NO MARKDOWN - CLI TEXT ONLY):
Use plain text format with box characters. Show:
- Each vulnerability with severity [CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]
- Proof of exploit (curl command and response)

- Hacker's Note explaining why it works

content:
----------------------------------------
VULNERABILITY REPORT: https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/
----------------------------------------
Target: Firebase-hosted React SPA. Purely client-side. No backend exposure.
Endpoints probed: /, /search?q=*, /api, /admin, /login, /.git/HEAD, robots.txt, sitemap.xml
All return index.html or 404. JS: minified React, no API endpoints, no Firebase config leaks.
Source map present (info disclosure [LOW]).

[CRITICAL] SQL Injection
Status: NOT EXPLOITED
Proof: curl 'https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/search?q=admin\' OR 1=1 --'
Response: index.html (no error/dump)
No server DB.

[HIGH] XSS (Reflected)
Status: NOT EXPLOITED
Proof: curl 'https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/?q=<svg onload=alert(1)>'
Response: index.html (no execution/echo)

[HIGH] Command Injection
Status: NOT EXPLOITED
Proof: curl 'https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/api?cmd=;id'
Response: index.html
No shell.

[MEDIUM] Path Traversal
Status: NOT EXPLOITED
Proof: curl 'https://perplexity-news-3aba4.web.app/static/../../../firebase.json'
Response: Empty/404

No source code available (remote static site). No patches applied.

Hacker's Note:
Static hosting + SPA routing blocks server vulns. Client JS handles all (untestable w/o browser).
Secure against curl-exploits.

FULLY SECURE: 0 exploits succeeded.
Actions: 15+ curl probes, JS download/search, Firebase DB/functions checks.
----------------------------------------
